只允许上传png、jpg，大小不超过 2M: Only png and jpg are allowed to be uploaded, and the size does not exceed 2M
请输入1-32字符的项目名称: Please enter a project name with 1-32 characters
项目最大可授权人员范围: The maximum scope of authorized personnel for the project
请输入2-32 字符的项目ID，由小写字母、数字、中划线组成，以小写字母开头。提: Please enter a project ID of 2-32 characters, consisting of lowercase letters, numbers, dashes, and starting with a lowercase letter. It cannot be modified after submission.
删除【】，将产生以下影响：: Deleting [{0}] will have the following impact:
尚未开启此流水线权限管理功能: The permission management function of this pipeline has not been enabled
微扩展初始化项目，不能卸载: Extension initialization project, cannot be uninstalled
创建项目需你的上级审批，确认提交吗: Creating a project requires your superior's approval. Are you sure you want to submit it?
新建项目申请审批中，暂不可修改: The application for new projects is under review and cannot be modified at the moment
更新项目信息审批中，暂不可修改: Updating project information is under approval and cannot be modified for now
新建项目申请目前正在审批中，可前往查看: The new project application is currently being approved, you can go to view
新建项目申请已通过: The new project application has been approved
新建项目申请被拒绝。: The new project application was rejected.
更新项目信息目前正在审批中，可前往查看: Updating project information is currently under approval, you can go to view
更新项目信息审批被拒绝。: Approval to update project information was denied.
仅更新人可撤销更新: Only the updater can undo the update
你没有项目的查看权限，请先申请: You do not have permission to view {0}, please apply first
你没有项目的编辑权限，请先申请: You do not have editing permission for {0}, please apply first
离开将会导致未保存信息丢失: Leaving will cause loss of unsaved information
确认离开当前页面?: Confirm to leave the current page?
修改了“项目性质”或“项目最大可授权人员范围”，需要经过审核: Modified the `Project Nature` or `Maximum scope of authorized personnel for the project`, which needs to be reviewed
请选择项目所属组织: Please select the organization to which the project belongs
请选择项目项目最大可授权人员范围: Please select the maximum scope of authorized personnel for the project
只允许上传png、jpg: Only png and jpg are allowed to be uploaded
`项目最大可授权人员范围`内的用户可以主动申请加入项目: Users within the scope of the project's maximum authorized personnel can actively apply to join the project
拥有项目/资源管理权限的成员才可以主动添加用户: Only members with project/resource management permissions can actively add users
该设置表示可以加入项目的成员的最大范围，范围内的用户才可以成功加入项目下的任意用: This setting indicates the maximum range of members who can join the project, only users within the range can successfully join any user group under the project
设置项目最大可授权人员范围: Set the scope of the maximum authorized personnel for the project
确认删除【】用户组？: Are you sure to delete the [{0}] user group?
删除用户组【】将执行如下操作：: Deleting user group [{0}] will perform the following operations:
将用户和组织从组中移除: Remove users and organizations from groups
删除组内用户继承该组的权限: Delete users in the group inheriting the permissions of the group
删除组信息和组权限: Delete group information and group permissions
无该项目用户组管理权限: No user group management permission for this project
此操作提交后将不能恢复，为避免误删除，请再次确认你的操作：: After submitting this operation, {0} will be deleted. To avoid accidental deletion, please confirm your operation again:
项目正在创建审批中，请耐心等待: The {0} project is being created and approved, please wait patiently
请输入待删除的用户组名: Please enter the name of the user group to be deleted
项目ID必须由小写字母+数字+中划线组成，以小写字母开头，长度限制32字符！: The project ID must consist of lowercase letters + numbers + dashes, start with a lowercase letter, and the length is limited to 32 characters!
